price: 39 ceux qui savent se défendre contre toute attaque injustifiée.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
